messages.title: A Fresh Approach for Bethnal Green and Bow
messages.content: I will work tirelessly to be a strong voice for all our communities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will only promise what we can deliver and work with you to make the changes that you want.
We need regeneration that involves local people and better planning to protect the character of the area.
We will support local businesses which are the lifeblood of our local economy.
We will invest in youth services and engage young people via better schools and training to improve their prospects.
We will tackle crime and anti-social behaviour.
We promise to fight for better transport services in Tower Hamlets.

issues.economy: We will support local businesses which are the lifeblood of our local economy.
issues.education: We will invest in youth services and engage young people via better schools and training to improve their prospects.
issues.governance: We need regeneration that involves local people and better planning to protect the character of the area.

housing.content: We will only promise what we can deliver and work with you to make the changes that you want.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will work tirelessly to be a strong voice for all our communities.

images.caption: Zakir Khan with a personal statement and key policies.
